# Contract

| ------ | ----------- | ------ |

| :eyeglasses: `get_trail_by_id` |  Returns a trail if found or panics if not. | `TrailSeries` |
| :eyeglasses: `is_owner` |  Verifies whether a given user, `AccountId` owns the copy of a trail. | `boolean` |
| :eyeglasses: `is_creator` |  Verifies whether a given user, `AccountId` is the creator of a given trail. | `boolean` |

| :eyeglasses: `get_fee_percentage` |  Returns the percentage amount Campground takes from each buy order if higher than minimum fee. | `number` |

| :eyeglasses: `nft_tokens` |  Query for nft tokens on the contract regardless of the owner using pagination. | `JsonTrail[]` |
| :eyeglasses: `nft_supply_for_owner` |  Get the total supply of NFTs for a given owner. | `U128` |
| :eyeglasses: `trail_tickets_for_owner` |  Query all tokens of an owner.  Similar to get_all_trails_by_owner with pagination. | `JsonTrail[]` |
| :eyeglasses: `nft_tokens_for_owner` |  Get list of all tokens owned by a given account | `JsonTrail[]` |

| :rocket: `new` (_constructor_) |  Initialization function (can only be called once).  This initializes the contract with metadata that was passed in and  the `owner_id`. | `Self` |

## Methods for `AdminBridge` interface

### :writing_hand: `change_campground_fee`

```typescript
change_campground_fee(args: { fee: number }, gas?: any): Promise<void>;
```

Changes Campground percentage `fee`.

### :writing_hand: `change_campground_treasury_address`

```typescript
change_campground_treasury_address(args: { addr: AccountId }, gas?: any): Promise<void>;
```

Changes treasury address to a new one.

### :writing_hand: `change_campground_minimum_fee`

```typescript
change_campground_minimum_fee(args: { fee: Balance }, gas?: any): Promise<void>;
```

Changes campground minimum `fee`, in yoctoNEAR.

```typescript
get_trail_by_id(args: { series_id: TrailId }): Promise<TrailSeries>;
```

Returns a trail if found or panics if not.

### :eyeglasses: `is_owner`

```typescript
is_owner(args: { series_id: TrailIdAndCopyNumber, owner_id: AccountId }): Promise<boolean>;
```

Verifies whether a given user, `AccountId` owns the copy of a trail.

```typescript
is_creator(args: { series_id: TrailId, owner_id: AccountId }): Promise<boolean>;
```

Verifies whether a given user, `AccountId` is the creator of a given trail.


```typescript
get_all_trails_by_owner(args: { owner_id: AccountId }): Promise<TrailSeries[]>;
```

```typescript
get_all_trails_by_creator(args: { creator_id: AccountId }): Promise<TrailSeries[]>;
```

```typescript
nft_supply_for_owner(args: { account_id: AccountId }): Promise<U128>;
```

```typescript
trail_tickets_for_owner(args: { account_id: AccountId, from_index: U128|null, limit: number|null }): Promise<JsonTrail[]>;
```

Query all tokens of an owner.
Similar to get_all_trails_by_owner with pagination.


## Methods for Contract

### :rocket: `new_default_meta` (_constructor_)

```typescript
new_default_meta: { owner_id: AccountId, treasury_id: AccountId };
```

Initialization function (can only be called once).
This initializes the contract with default metadata so the
user doesn't have to manually type metadata.

### :rocket: `new` (_constructor_)

```typescript
new: { owner_id: AccountId, metadata: NFTContractMetadata, treasury_id: AccountId };
```

Initialization function (can only be called once).
This initializes the contract with metadata that was passed in and
the `owner_id`.



---

References

- :rocket: Initialization method. Needs to be called right after deployment.
- :eyeglasses: View only method, _i.e._, does not modify the contract state.
- :writing_hand: Call method, _i.e._, does modify the contract state.
- &#x24C3; Payable method, _i.e._, call needs to have an attached NEAR deposit.
